visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type should be 'line'. The chart title should be 'Monthly Sales Data'. The axes and labels should have specific styling: X-axis labels should be in 'Arial' font with a size of 12px and a color of '#333333'. Y-axis labels should be in 'Verdana' font with a size of 14px and a color of '#555555'. The primary Y-axis title should be 'Sales in USD' and the secondary Y-axis title should be 'Profit in USD'. The data series should include two series: 'Sales' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4] and 'Profit' with data [129.9, 271.5, 306.4, 29.2, 544.0, 376.0, 435.6, 348.5, 216.4, 294.1, 35.6, 354.4]. The 'Profit' series should use the secondary Y-axis. Custom colors for the series should be '#008000' for 'Sales' and '#FFA500' for 'Profit'. Additional configurations should include a white background for the chart, a legend with a white background, positioned at the top-left corner with some margin, and tooltips formatted to display the series name and the point's category and value.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes two data series: 'Sales' and 'Profit'. The 'Sales' series uses the primary Y-axis, while the 'Profit' series uses the secondary Y-axis. The X-axis labels are styled with 'Arial' font, 12px size, and a color of '#333333'. The Y-axis labels and titles are styled with 'Verdana' font, 14px size, and a color of '#555555'. The chart background is set to white, and the legend has a white background, positioned at the top-left corner with some margin. Tooltips are formatted to display the series name and the point's category and value. Custom colors are applied to the series: '#008000' for 'Sales' and '#FFA500' for 'Profit'.
